properties.description: A weekly service in the church followed by hot drinks, cake and biscuits, light lunch and plenty of conversation in the church hall afterwards. Service 11:00-11:30 / Refreshments 11:30-14:00. Pop in for a quick cuppa, or stay for the whole afternoon! Everybody welcome.
properties.title: Open Church Glencoe
